{{Adaptation}}{{disambig-more|Elanor|[[Elanor (disambiguation)]]}} {{infobox character | people=[[Hobbits|Hobbit]] | name=Elanor Brandyfoot | image=The Rings of Power (TV series) - Elanor Brandyfoot.jpeg | caption="Elanor Brandyfoot" in ''[[:Category:Images from The Rings of Power (TV series)|The Rings of Power]]'' | pronun= | othernames=Nori | titles= | position= | location= | affiliation= | language= | birth=Late [[Second Age]] | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | family=[[Brandyfoot]] | parentage=[[Largo Brandyfoot]] and [[Marigold Brandyfoot]] | siblings=[[Dilly Brandyfoot]] | spouse= | children= | gender=Female | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Elanor Kellamark Brandyfoot''', also known as '''Nori''', is a [[Harfoots|Harfoot]] who was part of a caravan led by [[Sadoc Burrows]] during the [[Second Age]]. Elanor Kellamark Brandyfoot was invented by [[Amazon Studios]] for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'', where she was portrayed by [[Markella Kavenagh]].{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://www.imdb.com/title/tt9788618/fullcredits|articlename=Full Cast & Crew|dated=|website=IMDB|accessed=31 July 2022}} == History == In the first season, Elanor begins as one of the most adventurous [[Harfoots]], dreaming about the wonders beyond their [[Wandering Days|wandering]]. She and her best friend, [[Poppy Proudfellow]], after seeing a meteorite falling from the sky, discover a mysterious figure known as [[The Stranger]], who is later revealed to be one of the [[Istari]]. After this mysterious wizard decides to look for answers in the land of [[Rhûn]], following a hint from the [[Hermit's Hat]], which was a constellation that could only be seen there and was supposedly related to his mission, Nori, with the blessing of her family, goes with him. == Genealogy == {{familytree/start}} {{familytree | | ROS |~| LAR |y| MAR | | | | |ROS=[[Rose Brandyfoot]]
